mapper.select: select count(*) from TBL_REVIEW where productCode = #{productCode}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_review(reviewNo, cartNo, productCode, payCode, id, name, content, reviewPoint, reviewDate) values(tbl_review_seq.nextval, #{cartNo}, #{productCode}, #{payCode}, #{id}, #{name}, #{content}, ${reviewPoint}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update TBL_REVIEW set content = #{content}, reviewDate = #{reviewDate} where reviewNo = #{reviewNo}
mapper.delete: delete from TBL_REVIEW where reviewNo = #{reviewNo} and id = #{id}
